titles.title: A bill to establish a commission to assess the nuclear activities of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 9/25/2008--Introduced. Establishes the Commission To Assess the Nuclear Activities of the Islamic Republic of Iran which shall assess the status of, the relationship between, and the intentions behind the military and the civilian nuclear activities of the Islamic Republic of Iran. Terminates the Commission 60 days after submission of the report required under this Act.
